knimeNode.name: URL Encoder
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts string values so that they can be used in URLs.

fullDescription.intro: Converts string value to the application/x-www-form-urlencoded MIME format so that they can be used in URLs.
fullDescription.option: The columns containing string values to encode.

ports.inPort: The input table containing string values to convert.
ports.outPort: The output table containing the URL-encoded string values.
